desc: My Sister's Closet Chicago, a consignment/resale store on Chicago's Northwest side, carries women's clothing, children's clothing, teen clothing and home decor. Chicago area's favorite second-hand, consignment, resale, thrift store has authentic luxury designer purses along with Lululemon, Hunter, Michael Kors & More

layout.text: GREAT VALUES. GREAT LOOKS. GREAT FUN. SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE.
